servinfo.title: P/S Pump Removal and Installation for J20 Engine Model

attention2.ptxt: Never disassemble P/S pump for J20 engine model. Disassembly will spoil its original performance. If faulty condition is found, replace it with new one.

attention3.ptxt: Be sure to clean each joint of suction and discharge sides thoroughly before removal.

s1.ptxt: Take out P/S fluid in reservoir with syringe or such.
Remove intake manifold referring to Intake Manifold Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine .
Disconnect high pressure pipe (1) and suction hose (2) from power steering pump (3).

attention3.ptxt: As fluid flows out of disconnected joints, put a receptacle under joints or a plug to pipe.

s1.ptxt: Disconnect pressure switch lead wire at switch terminal.
Remove water pump and generator drive belt referring to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Removal and Installation (For J20 Engine) .
Remove P/S pump mounting bolts (1) and then remove P/S pump.

attention3.ptxt: Plug each port of removed pump to prevent dust or any other foreign matter from entering.

servinfosub.title: Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: P/S Pump Inspection for J20 Engine Model

servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure, and then nothing the following instructions.

attention3.ptxt: Fill specified power steering fluid after installation and bleed air without failure referring to P/S System Air Bleeding Procedure .
